price: Barakubaza bati “Ese ibyo uvuga (byerekeranye n’imperuka) ni ukuri?” Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Yego! Ndahiye ku izina rya Nyagasani wanjye! Ni ukuri! Kandi ntabwo mwananira Allah (nta ho mwamucikira.)”
arabic: ۞ وَيَسۡتَنۢبِـُٔونَكَ أَحَقٌّ هُوَۖ قُلۡ إِي وَرَبِّيٓ إِنَّهُۥ لَحَقّٞۖ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wayastanbiūnaka aḥaqqun huwa qul ī warabbī innahu laḥaqqun wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
translations: And they ask you to inform
